title.rendered: Comprehensive eLearning platform development: enhancing focus, collaboration, and monetization

<title>Comprehensive eLearning Platform Development: Enhancing Focus, Collaboration, and Monetization — ITRex</title>
<meta name="description" content="Learn how we assisted an EdTech startup with eLearning platform development. We implemented novel features, including a dashboard with students’ performance stats and lesson management tools. We also built a marketplace that enabled the client to advertise and sell educational content." />
